climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: 4K Ultra HD With over 8 million pixels — 4 times the resolution of 1080p — enjoy every scene with breathtaking detail.
Full Array Backlight LEDs are evenly distributed across the screen's backlight for superior light uniformity and picture performance.

Dolby Vison See it the way the director intended. Dolby Vision transforms your TV experience with incredible brightness, contrast, and color that brings entertainment to life like never before. V-series also supports HDR10+ and HLG high dynamic range formats.

VIZIO SmartCast With lightning-fast navigation, enjoy instant access to the best selection of built-in apps from top-tier streaming services like Netflix, Disney+, YouTube, and many more with the all-new Voice Remote or SmartCast Mobile app.
V-Gaming Engine Automatically makes the latest console gameplay more responsive with Auto Game Mode and the V-Series lowest input lag.
body.description: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For what it is… TV was great value.
reviews.reviewText: TV was in original packaging, box was well worn though. No remote batteries. No manual. But for price and what it is (which is mid/low tier tv) this was a great value. Has many features of higher end TVs. Picture is definitely good enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible! They tricked me!
reviews.reviewText: This TV is horrible. I bought it for my in-laws and had no idea it was refurbished! The ad did not have that word in it! TV had no remote, several settings do not work and the picture is horrible! I told them to toss it in the trash and bought them a TV from Costco! DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER!

reviews.reviewerName: Diane C. Nettles HarrisDiane C. Nettles Harris
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it. A Christmas gift from my husband
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Send a completely busted tv
reviews.reviewText: See quality control stickers all over it, tv looks fine until plugged in. Saw another review where someone else got a busted tv and I am almost certain we were sent this tv. Was delivered less than 5 minutes ago and am sending it back immediately! There is obviously no quality control if they sent this out but just one time but TWICE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars TV Arrived Damaged, Unusable
reviews.reviewText: Ordered a TV it arrived damaged, screen was busted I returned it and it has been delivered back to where it came from and still have not received the refund. It's been over a month.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Good thing TV comes with a great return policy
reviews.reviewText: The tv looks great. The shipping box was excellent. My tv can not be powered down. Turn off the tv, it comes back on. The scrolling feature is awesome at scrolling, as a matter a fact thats all it does is scroll. I cant stop it from scrolling. The frame that attaches the screen is loose. Be very careful when lifting or it might come off. I was sent 2 remotes, thats a plus. Catchy name too bad its not good as new. There is a great return policy, I am returning mine. Im not sure it will fit in my car, but I will manage. Hey I took a chance, meh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Vision OS sucks soooo bad!
reviews.reviewText: I almost returned this TV because I cannot stand Visio's operating system, home screen layout/suck-ass options, and the fact that certain apps (specifically Xfinity Stream) is not available to download. You have to painfully sideload (like with more technical methods than you're thinking because there is no option to allow downloads from unknown sources, or even a web browser app. You would literally have to download the .apk file and install while tethered to a laptop and using debugging programs to get widely used apps like that.... Alternative would be to go through a XBOX or something like that. But my Xbox is in my living room, fire sticks are more valuable to kindle actual fires rather than use for streaming, and I just want to be able to watch cable in my bedroom... But I can't. Visio gets two terds down for doing this. I hope their systems are breached by hackers and they are forced to file corporate bankruptcy.
